title: Online Teacher Community of Practice (CoP)-Based Instructional Design Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Current language educators participate primarily using smartphones, emphasizing professional development through project-based assessment and collaborative dialogue-based instructional methods (IC)

learning_goals: Learners can propose three or more pedagogical improvement ideas through collaborative dialogue in an online learning community
Learners can complete and present a pedagogical development project through continuous interaction with peer teachers
Learners can design and apply five or more effective teaching strategies for learners with diverse cultural backgrounds

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
